venue.name: Unleashed by Petco at the Bunker Hill Mall

item.description:
Charlestown Frenchie Fun at Unleashed by Petco.

We have a new Meetup event hosted by Mike the General Manager at Unleashed by Petco at the Bunker Hill Mall in Charlestown this Saturday.

Bring your Frenchie in on Saturday 11/3 from 1-3 for a Party featuring Pup-Pie, Frozen Yogurt from Natures Variety, Free food and treat samples, and indoor playtime with other Frenchies at Unleashed by Petco at Bunker Hill Mall 5 Austin St Charlestown, MA. FREE PARKING! Call with Unleashed any questions at 617-242-2093.

This event is no charge but of course Meetup donations of $3 per Frenchie to support our group are always welcome... I hope to be there but if not please make a mental note of what you can donate and hopefully you can pay at a later date.

Get your meetup on and come join the fun!

Thanks so much, Zeek!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Charlestown Frenchie Fun at Unleashed by Petco
